title: Top Places to visit in Kanpur (Kanpur Nagar), Uttar Pradesh
content: Kanpur is the 11th most populous urban agglomeration in India, largest urban agglomeration in Uttar Pradesh, 12th most populous city in India, and the second largest city in the state of Uttar Pradesh after Lucknow, and the most populous metropolis in Uttar Pradesh. The city is the administrative
